Action.Name: Debug.Clear
Action.Description: Clears the contents of the debug window.

Action.Name: Debug.GetEventContext
Action.Description: Returns a string describing the current event context, e.g. "Welcome > On Next".

Action.Name: Debug.GetTraceMode
Action.Description: Returns the current debug trace mode.

Action.Name: Debug.Print
Action.Description: Appends text to the bottom of the debug window.

Arg.Name: Text
Arg.Description: The text to add to the debug window.

Action.Name: Debug.SendToFile
Action.Description: Send the output to a text file as well as the debug dialog.

Arg.Name: Filename
Arg.Description: The full path to the file where the debug output will be written to.

Arg.Name: Overwrite
Arg.Description: Whether the debug information will overwrite Filename, if it exists, or append to it.

Action.Name: Debug.SetTraceMode
Action.Description: Turns debug trace mode on or off.

Arg.Name: Enable
Arg.Description: Whether to turn trace mode on or off.

Action.Name: Debug.ShowWindow
Action.Description: Shows or hides the debug window.

Arg.Name: Show
Arg.Description: Whether to show or hide the debug window.
